import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './CriteriaForm.css'; const CriteriaForm = ({ setProducts }) => { const [criteria, setCriteria] = useState({ businessType: '', sectors: [], selectionType: '', configType: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, checked } = e.target; if (name === 'sectors') { setCriteria((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, sectors: checked ? [...prevState.sectors, value] : prevState.sectors.filter((sector) => sector !== value) })); } else { setCriteria({ ...criteria, [name]: value }); } }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await axios.get('/api/products', { params: criteria }); setProducts(response.data); }; return (
Сферы деятельности
); }; export default CriteriaForm;
